price: 102. O jullie die geloven! Vrees Allah zoals Hij gevreesd behoort te worden en sterf niet, behalve als oprechte moslims (in volledige onderwerping aan Allah's éénheid).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِهِۦ وَلَا تَمُوتُنَّ إِلَّا وَأَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha ḥaqqa tuqātihi walā tamūtunna illā wa-antum mus'limūna
